metadata.title: CVE-2022-48837 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: gadget: rndis: prevent integer overflow in rndis_set_response()If "BufOffset" is very large the "BufOffset + 8" operation can have aninteger overflow.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
